snippet: Wade Thompson, who died in 2009, began devoting a sizable amount of his fortune in the 1990s to reviving the armory.
abstract: Inside Art column; Park Avenue Armory receives $65 million gift from Thompson Family Foundation.
lead_paragraph: Wade Thompson, who died in 2009, began devoting a sizable amount of his fortune in the 1990s to reviving the armory.

headline.print_headline: Park Avenue Armory Gets $65 Million Gift
headline.main: Thompson Family Foundation to Give Park Avenue Armory $65 Million
